message: This offer leaves us both with a significant sum, and ensures you still get a good amount despite the steeper inflation working against you.
I'm proposing a slightly more even split to account for the inflation we're both facing.  This gives us both a good share and ensures we don't lose too much to the decreasing value of the money.
Bob, we need to find a compromise. This offer is closer to my original proposal, acknowledging the rapid devaluation of your share. Time is running out!
